question: Which island is geographically related to Brunei?
explanation: Brunei is geographically related to Borneo Island. Brunei is located in the Southeast Asian Borneo Island. Brunei is located on the South China Sea coast. Java, Sumatra, Borneo and Sulawesi islands are the group of islands collectively known as the Great Sunda Islands. Borneo Island is under the control of three nations namely Brunei, Indonesia and Malaysia. Borneo Island has tropical rainforest vegetation.
